channel.title: How do I connect redash query api that has parameters to my python code im always getting this error "no cached results""
channel.description: How do I write the 'post' code for such api's ? Can anyone share with me an example?

item.title: How do I connect redash query api that has parameters to my python code im always getting this error "no cached results""
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Have you looked at the redash-toolbelt library? There is a complete example of how to refresh a parameterised query in Python there: redash-toolbelt/refresh_query.py at master · getredash/redash-toolbelt · GitHub

Read full topic
